issue.title: ign tools echo command unable to output data from custom Protobuf messages.

content.raw: @caguero thank you for your feedback! Really useful! Though shouldn't `PROTOBUF_GENERATE_CPP(PROTO_SRC PROTO_HDR DESCRIPTORS PROTO_DESCS ${protos})` or similar do the same as `protobuf_generate_cpp_with_descriptor()`? As far as I know `PROTOBUF_GENERATE_CPP()` is still a supported CMake function.
content.html: @caguero thank you for your feedback! Really useful! Though shouldn't PROTOBUF_GENERATE_CPP(PROTO_SRC PROTO_HDR DESCRIPTORS PROTO_DESCS ${protos}) or similar do the same as protobuf_generate_cpp_with_descriptor()? As far as I know PROTOBUF_GENERATE_CPP() is still a supported CMake function.
